title: Launch of RIQ Global Reinsurance Platform
description: IHC officially launched 'RIQ' (Reinsurance Intelligence Quotient), an AI-native global reinsurance platform based in Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM). The platform is a partnership between IHC, BlackRock, and Lunate, designed to serve global markets with an initial focus on high-growth regions across the Middle East, Asia, and select international jurisdictions. RIQ leverages advanced AI for underwriting precision, risk assessment, and capital deployment, supported by over $1 billion in initial equity and targeting over $10 billion in liabilities. The board is chaired by Dr. Sultan Ahmed Al Jaber, with CEO Mark Wilson leading the company. The platform is progressing through final regulatory steps with the ADGM Financial Services Regulatory Authority (FSRA).
source_name: IHC Reveals “RIQ” as Official Name of the New Global Reinsurance Platform  Based in Abu Dhabi

opportunities.title: Integration of Regional Insurance Data Providers with RIQ Platform
opportunities.description: Regional insurance data companies can cooperate with RIQ by providing localized risk and actuarial datasets to enhance the AI-driven underwriting and risk assessment functions. This partnership makes sense as it offers high-quality, region-specific data that can improve RIQ's modeling accuracy for Middle East and Asian markets—the initial focus regions for RIQ.
roadmap_steps: Map region-specific insurance data requirements of RIQ
Assess available local/regional datasets
Reach out to RIQ’s business development or data team
Propose data-sharing or licensing agreement
Develop secure API/data integration protocols

opportunities.title: AI Model Validation and Auditing Collaboration for Reinsurance Algorithms
opportunities.description: AI auditing or third-party validation firms specializing in financial services can work with RIQ to independently validate its AI underwriting and risk assessment models. This opportunity is realistic due to increasing regulatory demands for explainability and transparency in AI-driven financial platforms.
roadmap_steps: Research regulatory frameworks relevant to ADGM and RIQ
Develop AI audit service proposal tailored to reinsurance
Contact RIQ’s compliance and technical teams
Pilot an independent audit of a selected model segment
Deliver compliance and improvement reports

opportunities.title: Deployment of Cybersecurity Solutions for AI-driven Reinsurance Platforms
opportunities.description: Cybersecurity solution providers can propose tailored security packages for AI-native reinsurance platforms like RIQ. With large-scale sensitive financial data flows and reliance on AI infrastructure, securing these environments is crucial and aligns with RIQ advancing through regulatory approvals.
roadmap_steps: Analyze cybersecurity needs of AI-native reinsurance platforms
Design tailored security and compliance offerings
Initiate discussions with RIQ IT and compliance leadership
Conduct security risk assessment for RIQ
Implement and monitor cybersecurity tools

opportunities.title: Collaboration with Insurtechs for Embedded Reinsurance Products
opportunities.description: Insurtech firms developing digital insurance products for high-growth markets can partner with RIQ to offer embedded reinsurance capacity, using RIQ’s AI-driven pricing and risk models to back new, digitally-originated insurance offerings. This partnership is realistic given the expansion of embedded insurance and insurtech ecosystems in focus regions.
roadmap_steps: Identify insurtechs targeting digital and high-growth insurance segments
Develop proof-of-concept for embedded reinsurance APIs
Initiate technical and commercial discussions with RIQ
Integrate platforms for live data exchange and risk transfer
Jointly market new insurance offerings

opportunities.title: Advanced Analytics Providers Offering Portfolio Optimization Tools
opportunities.description: Analytics and software firms with expertise in portfolio optimization and capital allocation can supply tools or co-develop modules for the RIQ platform. By improving capital deployment efficiency, these partnerships reinforce RIQ’s competitive edge in deploying $1B+ equity.
roadmap_steps: Study RIQ’s capital deployment approach and equity structure
Build or customize portfolio optimization models
Present use cases and potential financial impact to RIQ leadership
Collaborate on pilot implementations within RIQ
Integrate tools into RIQ’s operating environment
